title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
Country Comoros has 666.54 times less GDP in billion U.S. dollars than Country Saudi Arabia which is the highest.
